## Support CAM

Donate or become a member. Join others in preserving an important part of America’s heritage. Your donations are crucial to sustaining a future filled with opportunities that promote a greater shared knowledge about our nation’s cultural past.

  * [Join](https://camla.org/membership/)
  * [Donate](https://camla.org/giving-opportunities/)

## What’s New

### [(Be)Spoken: Poems from Our Asian American Voices](https://camla.org/bespoken-poems-from-our-asian-american-voices/)

Visit our newest exhibit _(Be)Spoken: Poems from Our Asian American Voices_ at CAM, open from **May 16, 2025 – January 8, 2026**.

### [CAM Announces New Hours](https://camla.org/cam-returns-to-regular-hours/)

The Chinese American Museum is open **Tuesday to Sunday** from **10am – 3pm**.

## Current Exhibitions

[](https://camla.org/current-exhibits/#bespoken-poems-from-our-asian-american-voices)

### [(Be)Spoken: Poems from Our Asian American Voices](https://camla.org/current-exhibits/#bespoken-poems-from-our-asian-american-voices)

May 16, 2025 - January 8, 2026
